overview:
Chad Barden is a founder and managing partner of In-vivo Ventures. Chad is currently serving as Chairman and CEO of Quadraspec, an In-vivo portfolio company.

Mr. Barden received his B.S. in Finance from Purdue University. His initial career track in the financial services industry provided an excellent framework for starting and managing emergent companies. He has since held product management, business development, and senior executive positions with security software, security hardware, and telecommunications start-ups.

Mr. Barden also founded Nuron, which was acquired by Intel. After the acquisition of Nuron, Mr. Barden served Intel in Business Development for their Communications Group.
